    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ArberChartBuilder
    Fluent builder for quick chart panel configuration.
    AwtCanvasAdapter
    Graphics2D-backed ArberCanvas implementation (Swing/legacy bridge).
    AwtCanvasProvider
     
    ChartEngine
    Swing rendering helpers.
    ChartExportHandler
    Export handler for charts.
    ChartExportService
    Exports charts rendered by ArberChartPanel into images.
    ChartTooltip
    Lightweight Swing tooltip for chart overlays.
    ColorCache
    Lightweight ARGB -> Color cache for Swing rendering.
    HighPrecisionCrosshair
    Simple crosshair overlay for Swing charts.
    InteractiveLegendOverlay
    TradingView-style interactive legend overlay.
    PhysicalScaleResolver
    Swing DPI helper.
    StrokeCache
    Simple stroke cache keyed by width.
    SwingAssets
    Swing bridge utilities for converting core types to AWT equivalents.
    SwingRenderHints
    Applies render hints to Swing Graphics2D based on core hints.
